name: Morne's Creative Block World
description:
Join designer and frequent nerve bomb, Morne' as you delve deeper into his creative block consciousness. Set in his very own student flat somewhere in Potchefstroom, he's fighting Negative Thought Clouds, Procrasterminators and the elusive "Lecturer". Will you join the fight, designer?

Controls:

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

K - Roll (Dodge Attacks)

J - Attack (2 x + 3 x Consecutive Attacks Triggers Attack Combos)

R - Restart Game
